title: Navi Hajj
summary: Navi Hajj is your guide in Makkah and Madinah for Hajj and Umrah
description: Navi Hajj is an application that enables you to perform Hajj and Umrah in easy and smart way. The app will provide Hajj / Umrah tasks details and their locations on the map Feature:â€¢	Hajj and Umrah guiding â€¢	Show Miqat and Sacred locations in Makkah and Madinah â€¢	Interactive map to browse and navigate to local hospitals, hotels, restaurants. ATMs, Patrol stations.â€¢	Ability to add Point-of-Interest on the mapâ€¢	Ability to navigate to any places on the mapâ€¢	Track your Hajj/Umrah Progressâ€¢	Share your photos with your friends and social networks. â€¢	Snapchat-like filters â€¢	Prayers Time â€¢	Qiblah Direction and more. descriptionHTML:
Navi Hajj is an application that enables you to perform Hajj and Umrah in easy and smart way. The app will provide Hajj / Umrah tasks details and their locations on the map
Feature:
• Hajj and Umrah guiding
• Show Miqat and Sacred locations in Makkah and Madinah
• Interactive map to browse and navigate to local hospitals, hotels, restaurants. ATMs, Patrol stations.
• Ability to add Point-of-Interest on the map
• Ability to navigate to any places on the map
• Track your Hajj/Umrah Progress
• Share your photos with your friends and social networks.
• Snapchat-like filters
• Prayers Time
• Qiblah Direction and more. Get the app now.
